caller_intent: Cassandra wants to update her insurance policy to reflect that she is the sole driver (as her husband does not have a driver's license) and needs assistance canceling her current policy and starting a new one under her name.
resolution_steps: Agent confirms Cassandra is the sole driver and clarifies policy requirements.
Agent requests start date for the new policy and agrees to cancel the current policy.
Agent collects mailing address (104 Maple) and lien holder information.
Agent explains online access for payments and policy management.
Agent notes pending personal auto policy payment due by December 1st and renewal in February.
knowledge_required: Insurance policy requirements (e.g., driver's license verification)
Lien holder and mailing address handling
summary: Cassandra is updating her insurance policy to her name after discovering her husband lacks a driver's license. The agent is helping her cancel the current policy, set up a new one, and address payment deadlines. Cassandra will handle a pending personal auto policy payment and renewal in February.
